definition: to learn of (an event)/to hear about (sth)

sentences.english: Yi Yi surprised to learn the truth and exasperated, accusing children s four seasons in calculating.
sentences.chinese: 易奕获知真相惊怒交加，指责童四季攻于心计。

sentences.english: So far, 952 people have agreed to be notified of their test results by text messenge.
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止，已有952人同意通过短信获知检验结果。

sentences.english: He learned that the horse possess many qualities that that make them an excellent choice for guiding people.
sentences.chinese: 他获知马拥有很多在导盲时做出优良选择的资质。

sentences.english: Your hearts know in silence the secrets of the days and the nights.
sentences.chinese: 你们的心灵在沉默中获知白昼黑夜的秘密。

sentences.english: The financial arrangement and terms under consideration could not be learned.
sentences.chinese: 目前无法获知双方谈判中的财务安排和条款。

sentences.english: It emerged from the message that all was well.
sentences.chinese: 从获知的消息来看，一切都很好。

sentences.english: Blackburn received the news in a 2am phone call.
sentences.chinese: 布莱克本在凌晨2点通过电话获知这一喜讯。

sentences.english: Informed of this good news in many wards, the door closed quickly ran down the stairs or avoid misfortune.
sentences.chinese: 许多病房获知此凶讯后，连忙跑下楼或紧闭房门避祸。

sentences.english: It is through the use of logic and of precise, careful measurement tha t we become aware of our progress.
sentences.chinese: 通过逻辑思维和精确的测量手段才能获知我们的进步。

sentences.english: The White House was informed, according to the British newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 据报导，白宫已经获知该消息。

sentences.english: No one can learn- by looking at your face- if your cards are good or bad.
sentences.chinese: 没人能通过看着你的脸获知你拿着好牌还是坏牌。

sentences.english: By what mechanism does NUnit know what methods to test?
sentences.chinese: NUnit是通过什么机制获知需要测试哪些方法的？

sentences.english: And moreover, the positioning response time is also predicable .
sentences.chinese: 而在此情况下，位置响应之定位时间仍可获知。

sentences.english: Where did you hear about New7Wonders ?
sentences.chinese: 你是从哪里获知此活动？

sentences.english: Informed that your company is actively seeking to develop fresh talent.
sentences.chinese: 获知贵公司正为积极谋求发展招贤纳才。

sentences.english: Information on the number of women and juvenile prisoners was not available.
sentences.chinese: 关于女犯人和儿童犯的信息无法获知。

definition: to find out/to know/to learn about
to check/to inquire/to consult (a document etc)/inquiry/query
to make discreet inquiries/to scout out
reception (of transmitted signal)/to receive/to accept/to admit/to take over (e.g. a factory)/to expropriate
to consult/to refer to/to look sth up in a reference source
to ask about/to make some inquiries/to ask around
to confirm (sth to be true)/to verify
